channel.title: !Christmas Themed Server Help!
channel.description: Hey guys, i got a question and i want to know the answer. The question is, how do you get it to snow on your server? Thanks for the help!

item.title: !Christmas Themed Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

[quote=“iXiNathaNiXi, post:6, topic:376157”]Thanks alot clawz, you were a big help!

EDIT: Im new at this so TOMSCAPE BETA i got a error.

client.java:69: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable weather
location: class client
weather = weatherId;
^
1 error

In player.java declare public int weather = 1;
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: !Christmas Themed Server Help!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Theres a tutorial on this, I’ll quote it:

[quote=Universal-X;1564347]This can be used around Christmas time if wanted there can be more weather types i just haven’t tried, and if you want to make it more christmassy Change the Grass Texture in the Cache and the Trees as objects but make sure you save the originals so you can add them back if you need to…

First Step:
Add this Method in client.java

public void NewWeather(int weatherId) 
{ 
        outStream.createFrame(208); 
        outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(weatherId); 
        weather = weatherId;     
}

Final step:
Add this to boolean process.

        if(SnowOn) 
                NewWeather(11877);

And add this in players.java

public boolean SnowOn = true;

Declare this int in player.java

public int weather = 1;

Credits Universal-X![/QUOTE]

Read full topic
